description:
Oujirou is 17 years old. He`s http://anidb.net/ch5369 [Icchan`s] younger step-brother. He has been involved with Angelic Layer for many years, in a large part because it was what brought him and Icchan together after their parents married each other. Oujirou competes in Kobe and has been the champion of the Kansai Regional games, as well as being the runner-up in the national tournament for two consecutive years. He has a desperate desire to defeat http://anidb.net/ch5404 [Shuuko Suzuhara`s] angel Athena to get over a childhood crush he had on her. His angel is Wizard.
In the anime it is revealed that he is falling in love with http://anidb.net/ch3660 [Misaki], but he develops a love for both Shuuko and Misaki.
In the manga, he has no feelings for Misaki or Shuuko, but likes http://anidb.net/ch5406 [Tamayo].
name: Mihara Oujirou
